name: 林震
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。1.Introduction
2.Truss
3.Beam and Fram eq.
4.Plane stress and plane strain Eq.
5.Linear strain triangle Eq.
6.Axisymetric Elements
7.Three-Dimensional stress analysis
8.Plate bending elements
9.Dynamics of structures
schedule:
週次    單元
1-2　　Introduction
3-4　　Truss
5-6　　Beam and Fram 
7         Plane stress and plane strain Eq.
8　　Linear strain triangle Eq.
9　　Midterm Exam.
10　　Axisymetric Elements
11-12　　Three-Dimensional stress analysis
13-14　　Plate bending elements
15-16　　Dynamic Problems
17　　Analysis using ANSYS
18　　Project
scorePolicy: 作業與平常成績佔50%，期中考佔30%， Project報告佔20%。
